faces.stripped_text: When your turn begins, draw 1 card and lose 1 credit. When your turn ends, if you did not access any cards this turn, flip this identity.
faces.text:
When your turn begins, draw 1 card and lose 1[credit].
When your turn ends, if you did not access any cards this turn, flip this identity.
faces.title: Hoshiko Shiro: Mahou Shoujo

stripped_text: When your turn ends, if you accessed a card this turn, gain 2 credits and flip this identity.
text: When your turn ends, if you accessed a card this turn, gain 2[credit] and flip this identity.
title: Hoshiko Shiro: Untold Protagonist
